verbs.description: President Trump 's decision to [V: pull] [ARG1: America] [ARG2: out of the 2015 nuclear deal] is harshly chastised by Iran 's supreme leader . The Israeli military is on alert against Iranian forces in Syria .
President Trump 's decision to pull America out of the 2015 nuclear deal [V: is] harshly chastised by Iran 's supreme leader . The Israeli military is on alert against Iranian forces in Syria .
